AI Description: Genomepy is a Python package for downloading reference genomes and associated annotation files from various sources. It simplifies the process of obtaining genomic data required for bioinformatics analysis.
Core Features: Automatic Download Of Reference Genomes, Support For Multiple Genome Sources Such As Ncbi, Ensembl, Ucsc, Integration With Popular Bioinformatics Tools, Ability To Update & Manage Local Genome Databases
General Tags: Genomics, Bioinformatics, Python, Reference Genomes, Sequence Analysis
